entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 30%
